short_summary: Multiple Victoria-Class Spares - ANTENNA and O-RINGS
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.  The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.
tags: Multiple Victoria-Class Spares - ANTENNA and O-RINGS
Commercial goods classified as weapons such as Guns Ammunition Coulums
full_summary:
=====================================================

Multiple Victoria-Class Spares - ANTENNA and O-RINGS
=====================================================

**Tender Solicitation Number:** W8482-230800/A

**Notice Number:** cb-6120-97185750

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Bidder Selection Method:** Competitive - Traditional

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (G&S)

**Tender Description:**

The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the supply of antenna and O-ring spares for the Victoria Class vessels. The delivery locations are to be the Canadian Forces Bases (CFBs) at Esquimalt and Halifax.

The tender includes the following items:

* ANTENNA with specifications:
	+ NCAGE: K0801
	+ Part No.: 703982
	+ Quantity: 1
	+ Unit of Issue: EA
	+ Destination: CFB Halifax
* O-RINGS with specifications:
	+ Number: NNO: 99-7261640
	+ Number: NNO: 99-7705115
	+ Number: NNO: 99-7261645
	+ Part No.: Various
	+ Quantity: Various
	+ Unit of Issue: EA
	+ Destination: CFBs at Esquimalt and Halifax

**Key Dates:**

* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-08-24, 14:00 (Eastern Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-10-23
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-29

**Cancelled Tender:**

Please note that this tender has been expired, and it is no longer open for receipt of bids.

**Important Information:**

* The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* The procurement is subject to the Controlled Goods Program.

**Contact Information:**

Cassandra Leach, Contracting Authority
National Defence Canada
[101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2](https://maps.google.ca)
 Phone Number: (999) 999-9999
 Email: cassandra.leach@forces.gc.ca

**Required Attachments:**
=====================================================

* RFP document: [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6120/w8482-230800a--rfp.pdf)
* Annex A: [link](https://canadab
